name: Fat Panda!
description:
You must save FatPanda, a little fat panda, from Sushipuss, an evil octopuss who wants to feed him to (yes, you guessed it) eat him. 

So basically, Sushipuss throws you sushi rolls and you have to jump them. If you don't dogde the food he'll eat it (FatPanda is weak and loves sushi) and he'll be one step closer to his death.

WAIT! That's not all. Sushipuss will try to distract you (we've already told you he's evil) with puzzles that will complicate your race. But if you prove you're smarter than him by solving his puzzles (while you keep dodging sushi rolls, of course) your intelligence will hit and defeat him (yes, literally, your intelligence hurts him. He's too selfish). 

**Be smarter than the evil Sushipuss and save FatPanda!** 

🐙🔪 🍣 🍙 🐼 ☠️

## Controls

➡️ Jump: **spacebar** ⌨️ 

➡️ Solve puzzles: **mouse** 🖱️

## Programs

Unity Engine

Photoshop

Illustrator

Spine Pro

Sibelius

LMMS

Audacity
